|Casual Bird is a very addictive casual game. Touch the screen to hit the small |bird |wings that and try not to touch any of the thorns.
|Do not be fooled by the simple look, this game can be your friend in times that |have nothing to do. Try to collect as many points as possible and be better than |your friends.
|
|Different: Casual Bird innovative because it does not copy other games, other |genres and even characters. When you remember remember their matches, the first |thing that comes in mind is exclusively "Casual Bird".
|Controls: Tap the screen to make your bird flying leap into the air and get to |bypass the spikes that appear in his cage. Unfortunately you can not escape, but |may struggle to survive.
